cookingTips: Pat catfish fillets completely dry before coating to ensure seasoning adheres properly
Brush both sides generously with the butter-oil mixture for maximum flavor and crispy skin
Don't flip fish during cooking; air frying only on one side keeps it tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to coat catfish fillets with blackened seasoning and butter, then air fry them to achieve a crispy, spiced exterior while keeping the fish moist inside.
